snippet: The active coordination is turning one of the most inhospitable territories on earth into a complex security challenge for African and global forces.
abstract: Libya, with its ungoverned spaces, oil, ports, and proximity to Europe and Middle East, is becoming major terrorist hub, with jihadist groups, including branch of Al Qaeda and Islamic State, working together to expand their reach and capabilities; hundreds of people have been killed in terrorist attacks across region in past year alone.
lead_paragraph: The active coordination is turning one of the most inhospitable territories on earth into a complex security challenge for African and global forces.

headline.main: Jihadists Deepen Collaboration in North Africa
headline.print_headline: Jihadists Widen Their Networks in North Africa
